testsuite.name: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And There exists a class called "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And There exists a unit called "Unit 1" for class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And There exists a unit called "Unit 2" for class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "As1" in unit "Unit 1" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "As2" in unit "Unit 1" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "Ex1" in unit "Unit 2" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And There exists an assignment called "Ex2" in unit "Unit 2" part of class "TimelineClass"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: When I change the assignment "As1" in the unit "Unit 1" part of the "TimelineClass" class to start "today" and end "tomorrow"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I change the assignment "As2" in the unit "Unit 1" part of the "TimelineClass" class to start "tomorrow" and end "2 days from today"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I change the assignment "Ex1" in the unit "Unit 2" part of the "TimelineClass" class to start "3 days from today" and end "5 days from today"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I change the assignment "Ex2" in the unit "Unit 2" part of the "TimelineClass" class to start "10 days from today" and end "12 days from today"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "TimelineClass" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I go to the Edit Class Schedule page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see a timeline is rendered
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the module "Ex1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: When I move the module "Ex1" 10 to the right
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the undo button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the redo button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the unit "Unit 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see the following modules "As1, As2" are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the unit "Unit 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see the following modules "Ex1, Ex2" are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the unit "Default Unit"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see no modules are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the unit "Unit 1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see the following modules "As1, As2" are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I CTRL-click the unit "Unit 2"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see the following modules "As1, As2, Ex1, Ex2" are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I click the unit "Default Unit"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see no modules are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see no modules are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: When I click the Select All button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see the following modules "As1, As2, Ex1, Ex2" are selected on the timeline
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I go to the Edit Class Schedule page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: And I see a timeline is rendered

testcase.name: When I use the jump to button to jump to "365 days ago"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.name: Then I see the timeline is viewing the last year
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality

testcase.classname: Scenario: Test the timeline component renders properly and basic functionality
